mapper.select:
select club_no as clubNo, cnt as clubMemberCnt, club_name as clubName, club_category as clubCategory, club_limit as clubLimit, club_leader as clubLeader, filepath as clubMainImg, club_intro as clubIntro from (select club_no, count(*) as cnt from club_members group by club_no) right join clubs using (club_no)
where club_name like '%'||#{keyword }||'%'

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, member_email as memberEmail, member_addr as memberAddr, member_grade as memberGrade, member_birth as memberBirth, enroll_date as memberDate, nickName as nickName, member_state as memberState, member_img as memberImg, favorite from members where member_no in (select member_no from club_members where club_no=#{_parameter})
select * from club_boards where club_no = #{clubNo } order by club_board_no desc

select club_com_no as clubComNo, club_no as clubNo, board_no as clubBoardNo, member_no as clubComWriter, club_com_content as clubComContent, club_com_date as clubComDate, club_com_ref as clubComRef from club_board_coms where club_no=#{_parameter}
select chat_record_no as chatNo, chat_club as chatClub, chat_member as chatMember, chat_content as chatContent, chat_date as chatDate, filepath from chat_record where chat_club=#{param }

select club_no as clubNo, club_name as clubName, club_category as clubCategory, club_limit as clubLimit, club_Leader as clubLeader, filepath as clubMainImg, club_intro as clubIntro from (select rownum, c.*, (select count(*) from club_members m where m.club_no=c.club_no) as cnt from clubs c where club_category=(select favorite from members where member_no=#{memberNo })) where rownum between 1 and 3

select club_no as clubNo, cnt as clubMemberCnt, club_name as clubName, club_category as clubCategory, club_limit as clubLimit, club_leader as clubLeader, filepath as clubMainImg, club_intro as clubIntro from (select club_no, count(*) as cnt from club_members group by club_no) right join clubs using (club_no) where club_no in (select club_no from club_members where member_no=#{memberNo }) order by cnt desc
